CatDescriptText: S1/C John Stewart, 1124 Eddie Street, Portland, Ore, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 22, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that the visit of the Russian ruler, Khrushchev, will promote world peace?" answer reads: "Yes, sir. I think it will to a certain extent.  It probably will bring a better understanding between the two countries."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of S1/C John Stewart wearing U.S. Navy sailor suit and cap, standing in front of store window with display of vases
